Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.perception

Class EnvironmentBasicSensorModule

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.perception.EnvironmentBasicSensorModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasicSensorModule
public class EnvironmentBasicSensorModule extends Object implements BasicSensorModule
An implementation of the BasicSensorModule based on EnvironmentEvents broadcast through EnvironmentSensorUpdates, e.g., generated by the mosaic-environment simulator.

    • addEnvironmentEvent

      Adds a new EnvironmentEvent for the given Sensor.

    • cleanPastEnvironmentEvents

      public final void cleanPastEnvironmentEvents()
      The events are mapped into a map on the type. With multiple events to a same type, the last event is always taken. However, it should be part of good form to delete the event you no longer need to save some memory.
